template.name: liqui.insert_update
template.value:
DROP TRIGGER IF EXISTS $table_name$_BEFORE_INSERT/ CREATE TRIGGER $table_name$_BEFORE_INSERT BEFORE INSERT ON $table_name$ FOR EACH ROW BEGIN SET NEW.last_updated_at=CURRENT_TIMESTAMP; SET NEW.created_at=CURRENT_TIMESTAMP; END/
DROP TRIGGER IF EXISTS $table_name$_BEFORE_UPDATE/ CREATE TRIGGER $table_name$_BEFORE_UPDATE BEFORE UPDATE ON $table_name$ FOR EACH ROW BEGIN SET NEW.last_updated_at=CURRENT_TIMESTAMP; END/
template.description: Create trigger which updates timestamps on update and insert of records
